name: ModrinthUpdateChecker
short: Track Modrinth mods and receive update notifications in Discord.
description: Periodically polls the Modrinth API and posts rich embed notifications when a tracked mod releases a new version. Supports per-project Minecraft version filters, loader filters (Fabric, Forge, etc.), role pings, and configurable update channels.
author: Kd_Gaming1
install_msg: Thanks for installing ModrinthUpdateChecker! Use `[p]track add <project_id> <channel>` to start tracking a mod.
